original_title: Not to freak you out again
overview: "Not to freak you out again" is a personal diary film which chronicles the filmmaker's mother through a journey of illness, as told via text messages sent to the filmmaker. While these messages detail the nervous complexities of the early stages of an unknown medical condition, the footage shows a sparse domestic interior, almost brutal in its emptiness, save for a floral bouquet that bears witness to the passage of time.
title: Not to freak you out again
